info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:10PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Deer Lodge, southeastern Granite and southern Powell Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 209 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of West Valley, or 11 miles west of Anaconda, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anaconda, West Valley, Lost Creek and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
